# Draft:Lokesh Pawar

----
Lokesh Atul Pawar
Lokesh atul pawar, is a well knowned student of Pratibha International school who is said to have mastered the art of balancing objects on his right hands wether or not given that the thing is balancable.
Lokesh's Biological parents are - Atul and seema
Although Lokesh is Under-rated but he is the coolest piece of shit from pratibha international school.
Lokesh is now ongoing for his upcoming world record titles of Aizen conquering drawing with the supernatural talented prathmesh Jadhav
Lokesh is also a gym guy in his free time
